segments.text: I definitely want to meet with you , Mr . Parker . I just need to sort out my schedule .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , I know you ’ re pretty booked up these days . But , we ’ Ve got to work fast on this .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I realize that . We don ’ t have any time to waste . I can put you down for 9:20 . Could you make that , Mr . Parker ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Let me see . That ’ s no problem . I ’ ll see you then .
